reviewText: The price is overrated regarding the content of the dvd, I expected more professional and detailed information from the video

I can't say if this dvd is any good or not. It's listed as "All Regions" in it's ad, but it will not play on my dvd played and just gives a message about being the wrong region. I would not have ordered it if I had any clue that the "All Regions" designation ment all regions but the one I'm in. My dvd player is not that old. This has given me reason to doubt ordering dvds from Amazon again.
